detail_desc: Dungaree shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable straps with a metal fastener and a seam at the waist with press-studs at the sides. Chest pocket, front and back pockets and short legs with sewn-in turn-ups.

Jacket in washed denim with metal buttons, a faux shearling-lined collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and button at the sides. Faux shearling lining.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs.
Long jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with an unlined hood with a wrapover front, kangaroo pocket and long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs.

Short dress in patterned chiffon with frill trims and a V-neck with a concealed press-stud at the neckline. Sewn-in wrapover and an elasticated seam at the waist, and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Lined.
Short-sleeved, round-necked T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with pointelle details, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Double ribbed trim around the neckline, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Oversized top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Twisted side seams, double front vents and ribbing at, the cuffs and hem.
Braided elastic belt with imitation leather details and a metal buckle. Width 3.3 cm.
Trousers in a slightly stretchy weave in a relaxed fit with a high waist and fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets, a welt back pocket, and tapered, ankle-length legs with creases.

Suit trousers in a checked jacquard weave with an extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases and turn-ups. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Studio Collection. Straight-cut shirt in pima cotton poplin with a dramatic silhouette. Pointed collar, covered buttons down the front and short slits in the sides. Long, rounded puff sleeves with pleating and ruffle details and close-fitting cuffs with a covered button. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets and slim legs with creases.
Pull-on jeans in stretch, supersoft denim in a loose fit with an elasticated drawstring waist. Fake fly, side pockets, a back pocket, and elasticated hems.

Block-coloured top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and covered elastication at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved jersey top.
Jumper in a fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Trousers in a soft wool weave with a high waist and extended waistband with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Zip fly, side pockets and one jetted back pocket. Straight, extra-long legs with creases and a slit at the hems that can be fastened with a detachable tab and button.
Jacket woven in a cotton blend with an embroidered pattern containing glittery threads. Shawl collar, tie belt at the waist with metal D-rings, and slits in the sides. Lined.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted vest top in soft organic cotton jersey with lace trims around the neckline and armholes.
Sleeveless top in jersey with a lace-covered V-neck front and back.
Wide V-neck top in airy slub jersey with low dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Wide, sleeveless, straight-cut top in an airy rami weave. Double layer of large flounces at the top and a V-neck with a detailed trim and drawstring that can be pulled to tighten at the back of the neck and front. Narrow drawstring at the hem.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a motif.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and slim legs with narrow hems.
Comfort blankets in an airy cotton weave, one with an all-over print. Size 60x60 cm.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a lightly brushed finish. Straight, relaxed fit with dropped shoulders.

Boxy-style blouse in airy cotton with broderie anglaise. Small stand-up collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, and an asymmetric hem.
Embossed metal rings in various designs.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, motif on the front and a rounded hem.
Dog jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool. Polo neck, ribbing around the front legs and an opening for the back legs.

Three-piece set in soft cotton jersey with a tunic, pair of leggings and matching hairband. Tunic with lace cap sleeves, a box pleat at the front and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Patterned leggings with covered elastication at the waist, and a patterned hairband with a sewn-on bow at the front.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a stand-up collar and long sleeves with a wide flounce at the cuffs.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, an adjustable tab and button at the sides, and buttoned cuffs.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Shorter jumper in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed turtle neck, long dolman sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

LIMITED EDITION. Calf-length dress in airy, patterned chiffon with gathers at the top to create width. V-shaped opening at the top, a stand-up collar with ties and tone-on-tone tassels, and long, raglan-cut balloon sleeves with decorative pleats and cuffs with ties and tassels. Straight-cut hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Short jersey dress in a viscose and linen blend with a wide neckline, short sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Tube scarf and double-layered hat in soft jersey.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in soft, garter-stitched organic cotton. Jumper with a button placket, long raglan sleeves and raw, roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and raw, roll-edge hems.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton slub jersey. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Lined bikini top with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist, decorative trims at the top and medium coverage at the back.
Fitted T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
5-pocket, low-rise trousers in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and concealed button at the waist. Slim legs with decorative seams and zips.
Swim shorts and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with short raglan sleeves and a small stand-up collar. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with taped details and ventilating holes at the front of the sides. Long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs, and reflective details.
Slim-fit chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Vest tops in cotton jersey. One with an all-over print an one in a solid colour.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Lace-trimmed elastic at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Small pouch bag in imitation leather with appliqués and a zip at the top. Size 5x6x8.5 cm.
Jersey-lined trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy. Elasticated waist with a twisted drawstring and one back pocket.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a small loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles and fluted soles.
T-shirt in soft jersey with reversible sequins on the front and a rounded hem.

Ballerina dress with a body in soft jersey and glittery skirt in several layers of tulle. Body with long sleeves, a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, decorative bow at the back of the waist and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Cropped turtleneck jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Flat cap in woven fabric. Lined.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy jersey with a concealed zip in one side, a welt back pocket and sewn-in creases at the front.
Vest top in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend.
Sleeveless, round-necked top in jersey crêpe with pleats front and back and an opening with a button at the top.

Calf-length jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a sweetheart neckline, side support and a silicone trim at the top. Concealed zip in one side, a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and straight, wide legs. Lined at the top.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups, wide, lightly padded, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and an elasticated hem with hook-and-eye fasteners at the back. Extra firm support.

Boxy-style jacket in cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and side pockets. Low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide, covered elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in sturdy, ribbed cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.

Fitted top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with short, voluminous puff sleeves in a cotton weave. Square neckline front and back and elasticated edges over the shoulders and around the sleeves.
Set with a hat and scarf in a soft cable knit. Hat with a double-layered ribbed hem and pompom on top. Scarf with rib-knit short sides.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and a low crotch.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs,and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft fabric with motifs and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.

Jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with a square neckline and wide, rib-knit flounce over the shoulders. Long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in lightweight twill made from viscose and recycled polyester. High waist with pleats at the front and shaping darts at the back, and a zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets with a button and tapered legs with creases.
Wide top in soft cotton and modal jersey with short dolman sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
